channel.title: ChronicPkz 317
channel.description:
Website: http://chronic-pkz.com/index.php?
Downloadable client: https://www.mediafire.com/?226conovtt5cu51=0
Some Features - God Wars -Custom Client -Pest Control -New Boss' - All Skill Work - Online 24/7 Lag Free!! - Working Jad -Working Minigames - Active Staff from different timezones
ChronicPkz 317
Welcome to ChronicPkz, the RuneScape private server brought to you by Chronic and Ronnie. Here at ChronicPkz we take a different approach the other generic servers you come across. We work endlessly to bring you dedicated, high performance environment to play our enjoyable, content-filled server emulator.We invest a lot of dollars into our secure and stable server architecture to ensure dedicated up time and a fast connection, all protected behind high quality firewall mechanisms. Security and stability are very important to us, that's why we make sure we are the best around at offering this.In regard to content, ChronicPkz is a Economical server.
